questions.question: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

answers.answer: At my opinion, having an enjoyable job is better than making money.

As you know, the work is an important part of you life, if you live 100 years, you're going to be at work at least 33 years, i think it's really important to be happy and to go work in a good mouth, it's the key of the happinnes. However, if you wake up in the morning without the need to go work, you're going to be deppresive even if you earn a lot of money.
Finally, if i can advise you, let's do the job you like !
